title: 和业务方沟通砍需求
situation: A stakeholder wants to launch next week. You need to push back and suggest a phased approach.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.pinyin: Lǎobǎn xīwàng xià zhōu jiù shàngxiàn.
turns.translation: The boss wants to launch next week.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 时间太紧了，我们可以分两期做，先上核心功能。
turns.pinyin: Shíjiān tài jǐn le, wǒmen kěyǐ fēn liǎng qī zuò, xiān shàng héxīn gōngnéng.
turns.translation: The timeline is too tight. We can do it in two phases, launch core features first.
suggestions: 时间太紧了，我们可以分两期做，先上核心功能。
来不及，建议分两期，先上最重要的部分。

turns.speaker: partner
turns.translation: What exactly are the core features?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 我列一份清单，明天发给你确认。
turns.pinyin: Wǒ liè yī fèn qīngdān, míngtiān fā gěi nǐ quèrèn.
turns.translation: I'll put together a list and send it to you tomorrow for confirmation.
suggestions: 我列一份清单，明天发给你确认。
我整理一下，明天给你发清单。
